Name: Hyposphere Z
About the game: Hyposphere Z is a retro cyberpunk 3D puzzle platformer where you control a sphere, collect coins, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles by jumping or dodging them. Key features: - unusual graphics - completely immersive atmosphere - varied musical accompaniment - challenging levels - in-game store
